summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of NORTHEAST 127th STREET from 5th Avenue Northeast to 8th Avenue Northeast; by Asphaltic Paving, Watermains and Fire Hydrants; Local Improvement District No. 6656 appropriating money from the Federal Shared Revenue Fund in aid thereof; and repealing Ordinance No. 104495 which appropriated money from the Central Fund, in aid thereof.
